scripts.build: rollup -m -c -n explore -f umd -i src/main.js -o dist/explore.js && uglifyjs dist/explore.js -cmo dist/explore.min.js --source-map dist/explore.min.js.map && cp dist/explore.j* public/ && cp dist/explore.min.j* public/
scripts.build-editor-dependencies: cat node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js src/external/jstree.min.js > dist/explore.editor.dependencies.js && cp dist/explore.editor.dependencies.js public/
scripts.build-editor: rollup -m -c -n explore -f umd -i src/editorMain.js -o dist/explore.editor.js && cp dist/explore.editor.j* public/
scripts.build-server: rollup -m -c rollup.config.server.js -n explore -f cjs -i src/serverMain.js -o dist/explore.server.js
scripts.build-editor-css-dependencies: cat src/external/font-awesome.min.css > dist/explore.editor.dependencies.css && cp dist/explore.editor.dependencies.css public/css/
scripts.build-editor-scss: node buildScss src/editorMain.scss dist/explore.editor.css && cp dist/explore.editor.cs* public/css/
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-editor && npm run build-server && npm run build-editor-dependencies && npm run build-editor-scss && npm run build-editor-css-dependencies
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-editor && npm run build-server
scripts.clean: rm dist/* && rm public/explore* && rm public/css/explore*
